remarks: The kernel of the zero functional is the set of all vectors. (Contributed by NM, 17-Apr-2014.)
statement:
lkr0f.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lkr0f.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` D ) $.
lkr0f.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lkr0f.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lkr0f.k $e |- K = ( LKer ` W ) $.
lkr0f $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ G e. F ) -> ( ( K ` G ) = V <-> G = ( V X. { .0. } ) ) ) $.
